CustomField.formula: AssistantPhone & IF(BEGINS(AssistantPhone,'+61'),'0' & RIGHT(AssistantPhone,LEN(AssistantPhone)-3),'') & HomePhone & IF(BEGINS(HomePhone ,'+61'),'0' & RIGHT(HomePhone ,LEN(HomePhone )-3),'') & MobilePhone & IF(BEGINS(MobilePhone ,'+61'),'0' & RIGHT(MobilePhone ,LEN(MobilePhone )-3),'') & OtherPhone & IF(BEGINS(OtherPhone ,'+61'),'0' & RIGHT(OtherPhone ,LEN(OtherPhone )-3),'') & Phone & IF(BEGINS(Phone ,'+61'),'0' & RIGHT(Phone ,LEN(Phone )-3),'')
CustomField.label: Phones Combined
